ai-tha-ap181:1.3_0: Of those who are decide to live with suffering,
ai-tha-ap181:3.1_0: Your Majesty must say this to you,
ai-tha-ap181:4.2_0: whenever I live in the world
ai-tha-ap181:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap181:4.4_0: This is the fruit for tonics.
ai-tha-ap181:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap181:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable mentor.
ai-tha-ap181:8.1_0: For the ninth part of the senior, the ninth section.
